metadata.Title: CVE-2023-21122 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: In various functions of various files, there is a possible way to bypassthe DISALLOW_DEBUGGING_FEATURES restriction for tracing due to a missingpermission check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-11 Android-12 Android-12LAndroid-13Android ID: A-270050191

criterions.comment: android-framework-23: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
android-platform-frameworks-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
